name: *Learning Unity Practice* Duckie Rescue Squad
description:
Learning Unity and C#, Made this in 2 Weeks using Unity Online Documentation. 

It's not really a game but I would love to see people's feedback I know there is a lot wrong and things I can fix. Next Step for me is to learn Finite State Machines. 

If you want to Support me you can Donate on here or Check out my Patreon
